item.title: BlackRock's Rick Rieder: What portfolio works best as the Fed cuts rates
item.description: Rieder, a widely followed investor on Wall Street, said in a panel at the Future Proof Festival in Huntington Beach, Calif.. that he's bullish on Big ...

item.title: Apple is close to forming a bullish golden cross chart pattern
item.description: Apple is underperforming many of its "Magnificent Seven" peers, but its shares could surge if its stock forms the "golden cross" pattern.

item.title: More investors want public and private assets in their portfolio. Now there's a benchmark to track this combo
item.description: Morningstar announced the Modern Market 100, the first framework to combine public and private equity exposure in one index.

item.title: Bank of America says these dividend stocks have a history of outperformance in this environment
item.description: There's been a shift in Bank of America Securities' business-cycle metric that is good news for certain dividend stocks.

item.title: Buy this packaging stock primed for a recovery, says Carter Worth
item.description: Carter Worth breaks down the technical outlook on this stock.
